General.Name: Satia Industries Limited
General.Description: Satia Industries Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of writing, printing, and specialty paper in India. It operates through Paper, Yarn and Cotton, Cogeneration, Agriculture, and Solar divisions. The company offers ultra-print, ultra-premium, snow white, super snow white, map-litho, coloured printing, azure laid and ledger, cartridge, bond, duplicating, water mark, chromo, and photo copier papers for use in printing of books, directories, envelopes, diaries, calendars, computer stationery, copier paper, annual reports, and printing segments, as well as cup stock paper, which is used in disposable cutlery. It also provides virgin-based fibre cups as a replacement to plastic cups for water, tea, or cold drinks. In addition, the company is involved in the generation of solar power; trading of cotton and yarns; agricultural and plantation operations; and sale of renewable energy credits. Satia Industries Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Satia Paper Mills Limited. Satia Industries Limited was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Sri Muktsar Sahib, India.
General.Address: Malout-Muktsar Road, Sri Muktsar Sahib, India, 152032
